languages.text: "Я в нетерпении ожидаю, когда вы покажете мне свою розетту священной Инквизиции. Наверняка она у вас есть... Нет? Как странно. Мне казалось, что такие эксперименты в ведении моих почтенных коллег из Ордо Еретикус".

traits.locale_text: "Я нахожу вашу позицию довольно рисковой. Что ж, будем считать, что Кьява Гамма — это ваш... эксперимент".

languages.text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."
languages.original_text: "Я в нетерпении ожидаю, когда вы покажете мне свою розетту священной Инквизиции. Наверняка она у вас есть... Нет? Как странно. Мне казалось, что такие эксперименты в ведении моих почтенных коллег из Ордо Еретикус".

traits.locale_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

"I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

"I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

"I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

"I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

languages.text: 「私は心からその時を待ち望むよ、神聖な異端審問庁のロゼットをお前が見せてくれる時を。お前は間違いなく身につける……そうだろう？妙な話だ。粛清の団に所属する同僚たちの目が届く場所で、そのような実験を行うか私も考えたよ」
languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

traits.locale_text: 「私は心からその時を待ち望むよ、神聖な異端審問庁のロゼットをお前が見せてくれる時を。お前は間違いなく身につける……そうだろう？妙な話だ。粛清の団に所属する同僚たちの目が届く場所で、そのような実験を行うか私も考えたよ」

languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

languages.text: “我已经迫不及待想看看神圣的审判庭授予你的玫瑰结了。你肯定戴在身上了吧……没有吗？这可真奇怪。我还以为有权做这种观察实验的，怎么也得是我们异端审判庭的优秀同僚才对。”
languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

traits.locale_text: “我已经迫不及待想看看神圣的审判庭授予你的玫瑰结了。你肯定戴在身上了吧……没有吗？这可真奇怪。我还以为有权做这种观察实验的，怎么也得是我们异端审判庭的优秀同僚才对。”

languages.text: «Me gustaría ver su roseta de la Santa Inquisición. Imagino que la lleva encima... ¿ah, no? Es curioso. Pensaba que esa clase de experimentos solo les estaban permitidos a mis estimados camaradas del Ordo Hereticus».
languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría ver su roseta de la Santa Inquisición. Imagino que la lleva encima... ¿ah, no? Es curioso. Pensaba que esa clase de experimentos solo les estaban permitidos a mis estimados camaradas del Ordo Hereticus».

languages.text: « J'ai hâte que vous me montriez votre insigne de la Sainte Inquisition. J'imagine que vous l'avez sur vous... Non ? Comme c'est étrange. Il me semblait pourtant que les expériences de ce genre étaient du ressort de mes honorables collègues de l'Ordo Hereticus. »
languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai hâte que vous me montriez votre insigne de la Sainte Inquisition. J'imagine que vous l'avez sur vous... Non ? Comme c'est étrange. Il me semblait pourtant que les expériences de ce genre étaient du ressort de mes honorables collègues de l'Ordo Hereticus. »

languages.text: "Ich warte schon sehnsüchtig auf den Moment, wenn Ihr mir Eure Rosette der heiligen Inquisition zeigt. Ihr habt sie doch sicher bei Euch ... Nicht? Merkwürdig. Ich dachte, derlei Experimente wären im Ermessen meiner geschätzten Kollegen vom Ordo Haereticus."
languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

traits.locale_text: "Ich warte schon sehnsüchtig auf den Moment, wenn Ihr mir Eure Rosette der heiligen Inquisition zeigt. Ihr habt sie doch sicher bei Euch ... Nicht? Merkwürdig. Ich dachte, derlei Experimente wären im Ermessen meiner geschätzten Kollegen vom Ordo Haereticus."

languages.text: "Bana Kutsal Engizisyon rozetini göstereceğin anı iple çekiyorum. Üzerindedir kesin, değil mi? Çok enteresan. Bu tip deneylerin Kâfir Nizamı'ndaki değerli çalışma arkadaşlarımın yetki alanında olduğunu sanıyordum."
languages.original_text: "I eagerly await the moment when you show me your rosette of the Holy Inquisition. Surely you have it on you... You don't? How strange. I thought that such experiments were within the purview of my esteemed colleagues from the Ordo Hereticus."

traits.locale_text: "Bana Kutsal Engizisyon rozetini göstereceğin anı iple çekiyorum. Üzerindedir kesin, değil mi? Çok enteresan. Bu tip deneylerin Kâfir Nizamı'ndaki değerli çalışma arkadaşlarımın yetki alanında olduğunu sanıyordum."
